A statement from David Cameron read: I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. '' Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government. Andy Coulson 's position had appeared tenuous for several months as the row over phone hacking at the News of the World intensified. was going to take time for everything to come together under the leadership of Allen Iverson . Try two games. Allen Iverson had 28 points and 13 assists in Denver's 116-105 victory over the Boston Celtics on Tuesday night. I'd say we're real comfortable with him now, said Tyreke Evans , who had 14 points and 14 rebounds coming off the bench.
